author: owenb
msg: New test for passing chars and arrays of chars to and from a Java service

author: owenb
msg: Updates to compatibility methods so that the Java and EJB providers better interoperate with the SOAP providers:
- Allow arrays of Strings* to be passed as part values when the method argument is an array of chars or Characters
* All the Strings must have length 1
- Convert all return values of type Character (char) to Strings
- Move common methods to a new ProviderUtils class
These conversions are useful because the XML schema does not define a char type
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch
